column2: A 25% chance to become §YCruel§!
An imperial task force prowls the Black Sea for pirates.
You decline the gift.
The merchant continues his tales.
The Varangians are released and return to their commander.
You wash your hands of chariot racing.
You refuse to take part in this scheme.
Anaximandros is thrown into the dungeons and you put this vile scheme behind you for good.
The city is beset by rioters and hooligans.
To the Hippodrome!
Your servants leave to fetch the eunuch.
This affair has been settled.
You refuse to deal with this eunuch.
You forget all about this explosion and drink some more wine.
The responsible Varangians are executed.
Rome once more becomes the seat of imperial power.
Your spies are sent to infiltrate the ports.
You send the merchants away.
Your ship hoists its sails.
Your vassals are impressed by this display of Imperial power.
You accept the challenge.
You refuse the challenge.
Holder is §YOrthodox§!, §YPaulician§!, §YMonothelite§! or §YIconoclast§! and NOT a heretic\n
